00671 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(lprocfs_nid_stats_clear);
00672 
00681 static int ofd_procfs_init(struct ofd_device *ofd)
00682 {
00683         struct obd_device               *obd = ofd_obd(ofd);
00684         struct proc_dir_entry           *entry;
00685         int                              rc = 0;
00686 
00687         ENTRY;
00688 
00689         /* lprocfs must be setup before the ofd so state can be safely added
00690          * to /proc incrementally as the ofd is setup */
00691         obd->obd_vars = lprocfs_ofd_obd_vars;
00692         rc = lprocfs_obd_setup(obd);
00693         if (rc) {
00694                 CERROR("%s: lprocfs_obd_setup failed: %d.\n",
00695                        obd->obd_name, rc);
00696                 RETURN(rc);
00697         }
00698 
00699         rc = lprocfs_alloc_obd_stats(obd, LPROC_OFD_STATS_LAST);
00700         if (rc) {
00701                 CERROR("%s: lprocfs_alloc_obd_stats failed: %d.\n",
00702                        obd->obd_name, rc);
00703                 GOTO(obd_cleanup, rc);
00704         }
00705 
00706         obd->obd_uses_nid_stats = 1;
00707 
00708         entry = lprocfs_register("exports", obd->obd_proc_entry, NULL, NULL);
00709         if (IS_ERR(entry)) {
00710                 rc = PTR_ERR(entry);
00711                 CERROR("%s: error %d setting up lprocfs for %s\n",
00712                        obd->obd_name, rc, "exports");
00713                 GOTO(obd_cleanup, rc);
00714         }
00715         obd->obd_proc_exports_entry = entry;
00716 
00717         entry = lprocfs_add_simple(obd->obd_proc_exports_entry, "clear",
00718                                    obd, &lprocfs_nid_stats_clear_fops);
00719         if (IS_ERR(entry)) {
00720                 rc = PTR_ERR(entry);
00721                 CERROR("%s: add proc entry 'clear' failed: %d.\n",
00722                        obd->obd_name, rc);
00723                 GOTO(obd_cleanup, rc);
00724         }
00725 
00726         ofd_stats_counter_init(obd->obd_stats);
00727 
00728         rc = lprocfs_job_stats_init(obd, LPROC_OFD_STATS_LAST,
00729                                     ofd_stats_counter_init);
00730         if (rc)
00731                 GOTO(obd_cleanup, rc);
00732         RETURN(0);
00733 obd_cleanup:
00734         lprocfs_obd_cleanup(obd);
00735         lprocfs_free_obd_stats(obd);
00736 
00737         return rc;
00738 }
00739 
00751 static void ofd_procfs_add_brw_stats_symlink(struct ofd_device *ofd)
00752 {
00753         struct obd_device       *obd = ofd_obd(ofd);
00754         struct obd_device       *osd_obd = ofd->ofd_osd_exp->exp_obd;
00755 
00756         if (obd->obd_proc_entry == NULL)
00757                 return;
00758 
00759         lprocfs_add_symlink("brw_stats", obd->obd_proc_entry,
00760                             "../../%s/%s/brw_stats",
00761                             osd_obd->obd_type->typ_name, obd->obd_name);
00762 
00763         lprocfs_add_symlink("read_cache_enable", obd->obd_proc_entry,
00764                             "../../%s/%s/read_cache_enable",
00765                             osd_obd->obd_type->typ_name, obd->obd_name);
00766 
00767         lprocfs_add_symlink("readcache_max_filesize",
00768                             obd->obd_proc_entry,
00769                             "../../%s/%s/readcache_max_filesize",
00770                             osd_obd->obd_type->typ_name, obd->obd_name);
00771 
00772         lprocfs_add_symlink("writethrough_cache_enable",
00773                             obd->obd_proc_entry,
00774                             "../../%s/%s/writethrough_cache_enable",
00775                             osd_obd->obd_type->typ_name, obd->obd_name);
00776 }
00777 
00783 static void ofd_procfs_fini(struct ofd_device *ofd)
00784 {
00785         struct obd_device *obd = ofd_obd(ofd);
00786 
00787         lprocfs_free_per_client_stats(obd);
00788         lprocfs_obd_cleanup(obd);
00789         lprocfs_free_obd_stats(obd);
00790         lprocfs_job_stats_fini(obd);
00791 }
00792 
00802 int ofd_fid_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd)
00803 {
00804         return seq_site_fini(env, &ofd->ofd_seq_site);
00805 }
00806 
00824 int ofd_fid_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd)
00825 {
00826         struct seq_server_site  *ss = &ofd->ofd_seq_site;
00827         struct lu_device        *lu = &ofd->ofd_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev;
00828         char                    *obd_name = ofd_name(ofd);
00829         char                    *name = NULL;
00830         int                     rc = 0;
00831 
00832         ss = &ofd->ofd_seq_site;
00833         lu->ld_site->ld_seq_site = ss;
00834         ss->ss_lu = lu->ld_site;
00835         ss->ss_node_id = ofd->ofd_lut.lut_lsd.lsd_osd_index;
00836 
00837         OBD_ALLOC(name, sizeof(obd_name) * 2 + 10);
00838         if (name == NULL)
00839                 return -ENOMEM;
00840 
00841         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ss->ss_server_seq);
00842         if (ss->ss_server_seq == NULL)
00843                 GOTO(out_name, rc = -ENOMEM);
00844 
00845         rc = seq_server_init(env, ss->ss_server_seq, ofd->ofd_osd, obd_name,
00846                              LUSTRE_SEQ_SERVER, ss);
00847         if (rc) {
00848                 CERROR("%s : seq server init error %d\n", obd_name, rc);
00849                 GOTO(out_server, rc);
00850         }
00851         ss->ss_server_seq->lss_space.lsr_index = ss->ss_node_id;
00852 
00853         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ss->ss_client_seq);
00854         if (ss->ss_client_seq == NULL)
00855                 GOTO(out_server, rc = -ENOMEM);
00856 
00857         /*
00858          * It always printed as "%p", so that the name is unique in the kernel,
00859          * even if the filesystem is mounted twice. So sizeof(.) * 2 is enough.
00860          */
00861         snprintf(name, sizeof(obd_name) * 2 + 7, "%p-super", obd_name);
00862         rc = seq_client_init(ss->ss_client_seq, NULL, LUSTRE_SEQ_DATA,
00863                              name, NULL);
00864         if (rc) {
00865                 CERROR("%s : seq client init error %d\n", obd_name, rc);
00866                 GOTO(out_client, rc);
00867         }
00868 
00869         rc = seq_server_set_cli(env, ss->ss_server_seq, ss->ss_client_seq);
00870 
00871         if (rc) {
00872 out_client:
00873                 seq_client_fini(ss->ss_client_seq);
00874                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ss->ss_client_seq);
00875                 ss->ss_client_seq = NULL;
00876 out_server:
00877                 seq_server_fini(ss->ss_server_seq, env);
00878                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ss->ss_server_seq);
00879                 ss->ss_server_seq = NULL;
00880         }
00881 out_name:
00882         OBD_FREE(name, sizeof(obd_name) * 2 + 10);
00883 
00884         return rc;
00885 }
00886 
00897 static int ofd_set_info_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00898 {
00899         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
00900         struct ost_body         *body = NULL, *repbody;
00901         void                    *key, *val = NULL;
00902         int                      keylen, vallen, rc = 0;
00903         bool                     is_grant_shrink;
00904 
00905         ENTRY;
00906 
00907         key = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_SETINFO_KEY);
00908         if (key == NULL) {
00909                 DEBUG_REQ(D_HA, req, "no set_info key");
00910                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00911         }
00912         keylen = req_capsule_get_size(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_SETINFO_KEY,
00913                                       RCL_CLIENT);
00914 
00915         val = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_SETINFO_VAL);
00916         if (val == NULL) {
00917                 DEBUG_REQ(D_HA, req, "no set_info val");
00918                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00919         }
00920         vallen = req_capsule_get_size(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_SETINFO_VAL,
00921                                       RCL_CLIENT);
00922 
00923         is_grant_shrink = KEY_IS(KEY_GRANT_SHRINK);
00924         if (is_grant_shrink)
00925                 /* In this case the value is actually an RMF_OST_BODY, so we
00926                  * transmutate the type of this PTLRPC */
00927                 req_capsule_extend(tsi->tsi_pill, &RQF_OST_SET_GRANT_INFO);
00928 
00929         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(tsi->tsi_pill);
00930         if (rc < 0)
00931                 RETURN(rc);
00932 
00933         if (is_grant_shrink) {
00934                 body = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
00935 
00936                 repbody = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
00937                 *repbody = *body;
00938 
00940                 ofd_grant_prepare_read(tsi->tsi_env, tsi->tsi_exp,
00941                                        &repbody->oa);
00942         } else if (KEY_IS(KEY_EVICT_BY_NID)) {
00943                 if (vallen > 0)
00944                         obd_export_evict_by_nid(tsi->tsi_exp->exp_obd, val);
00945                 rc = 0;
00946         } else if (KEY_IS(KEY_SPTLRPC_CONF)) {
00947                 rc = tgt_adapt_sptlrpc_conf(tsi->tsi_tgt, 0);
00948         } else {
00949                 CERROR("%s: Unsupported key %s\n",
00950                        tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), (char *)key);
00951                 rc = -EOPNOTSUPP;
00952         }
00953         ofd_counter_incr(tsi->tsi_exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_SET_INFO,
00954                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
00955 
00956         RETURN(rc);
00957 }
00958 
00973 int ofd_fiemap_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd,
00974                    struct lu_fid *fid, struct fiemap *fiemap)
00975 {
00976         struct ofd_object       *fo;
00977         int                      rc;
00978 
00979         fo = ofd_object_find(env, ofd, fid);
00980         if (IS_ERR(fo)) {
00981                 CERROR("%s: error finding object "DFID"\n",
00982                        ofd_name(ofd), PFID(fid));
00983                 return PTR_ERR(fo);
00984         }
00985 
00986         ofd_read_lock(env, fo);
00987         if (ofd_object_exists(fo))
00988                 rc = dt_fiemap_get(env, ofd_object_child(fo), fiemap);
00989         else
00990                 rc = -ENOENT;
00991         ofd_read_unlock(env, fo);
00992         ofd_object_put(env, fo);
00993         return rc;
00994 }
00995 
00996 struct locked_region {
00997         struct list_head        list;
00998         struct lustre_handle    lh;
00999 };
01000 
01017 static int lock_region(struct ldlm_namespace *ns, struct ldlm_res_id *res_id,
01018                        unsigned long long begin, unsigned long long end,
01019                        struct list_head *locked)
01020 {
01021         struct locked_region    *region = NULL;
01022         __u64                    flags = 0;
01023         int                      rc;
01024 
01025         LASSERT(begin <= end);
01026         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(region);
01027         if (region == NULL)
01028                 return -ENOMEM;
01029 
01030         rc = tgt_extent_lock(ns, res_id, begin, end, &region->lh,
01031                              LCK_PR, &flags);
01032         if (rc != 0)
01033                 return rc;
01034 
01035         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "ost lock [%llu,%llu], lh=%p\n", begin, end,
01036                &region->lh);
01037         list_add(&region->list, locked);
01038 
01039         return 0;
01040 }
01041 
01060 static int lock_zero_regions(struct ldlm_namespace *ns,
01061                              struct ldlm_res_id *res_id,
01062                              struct fiemap *fiemap,
01063                              struct list_head *locked)
01064 {
01065         __u64 begin = fiemap->fm_start;
01066         unsigned int i;
01067         int rc = 0;
01068         struct fiemap_extent *fiemap_start = fiemap->fm_extents;
01069 
01070         ENTRY;
01071 
01072         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "extents count %u\n", fiemap->fm_mapped_extents);
01073         for (i = 0; i < fiemap->fm_mapped_extents; i++) {
01074                 if (fiemap_start[i].fe_logical > begin) {
01075                         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "ost lock [%llu,%llu]\n",
01076                                begin, fiemap_start[i].fe_logical);
01077                         rc = lock_region(ns, res_id, begin,
01078                                          fiemap_start[i].fe_logical, locked);
01079                         if (rc)
01080                                 RETURN(rc);
01081                 }
01082 
01083                 begin = fiemap_start[i].fe_logical + fiemap_start[i].fe_length;
01084         }
01085 
01086         if (begin < (fiemap->fm_start + fiemap->fm_length)) {
01087                 CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "ost lock [%llu,%llu]\n",
01088                        begin, fiemap->fm_start + fiemap->fm_length);
01089                 rc = lock_region(ns, res_id, begin,
01090                                  fiemap->fm_start + fiemap->fm_length, locked);
01091         }
01092 
01093         RETURN(rc);
01094 }
01095 
01105 static void
01106 unlock_zero_regions(struct ldlm_namespace *ns, struct list_head *locked)
01107 {
01108         struct locked_region *entry, *temp;
01109 
01110         list_for_each_entry_safe(entry, temp, locked, list) {
01111                 CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "ost unlock lh=%p\n", &entry->lh);
01112                 tgt_extent_unlock(&entry->lh, LCK_PR);
01113                 list_del(&entry->list);
01114                 OBD_FREE_PTR(entry);
01115         }
01116 }
01117 
01136 static int ofd_get_info_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01137 {
01138         struct obd_export               *exp = tsi->tsi_exp;
01139         struct ofd_device               *ofd = ofd_exp(exp);
01140         struct ofd_thread_info          *fti = tsi2ofd_info(tsi);
01141         void                            *key;
01142         int                              keylen;
01143         int                              replylen, rc = 0;
01144 
01145         ENTRY;
01146 
01147         /* this common part for get_info rpc */
01148         key = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_GETINFO_KEY);
01149         if (key == NULL) {
01150                 DEBUG_REQ(D_HA, tgt_ses_req(tsi), "no get_info key");
01151                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
01152         }
01153         keylen = req_capsule_get_size(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_GETINFO_KEY,
01154                                       RCL_CLIENT);
01155 
01156         if (KEY_IS(KEY_LAST_ID)) {
01157                 u64             *last_id;
01158                 struct ofd_seq  *oseq;
01159 
01160                 req_capsule_extend(tsi->tsi_pill, &RQF_OST_GET_INFO_LAST_ID);
01161                 rc = req_capsule_server_pack(tsi->tsi_pill);
01162                 if (rc)
01163                         RETURN(err_serious(rc));
01164 
01165                 last_id = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OBD_ID);
01166 
01167                 oseq = ofd_seq_load(tsi->tsi_env, ofd,
01168                                     (u64)exp->exp_filter_data.fed_group);
01169                 if (IS_ERR(oseq))
01170                         rc = -EFAULT;
01171                 else
01172                         *last_id = ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq);
01173                 ofd_seq_put(tsi->tsi_env, oseq);
01174         } else if (KEY_IS(KEY_FIEMAP)) {
01175                 struct ll_fiemap_info_key       *fm_key;
01176                 struct fiemap                   *fiemap;
01177                 struct lu_fid                   *fid;
01178 
01179                 req_capsule_extend(tsi->tsi_pill, &RQF_OST_GET_INFO_FIEMAP);
01180 
01181                 fm_key = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_FIEMAP_KEY);
01182                 rc = tgt_validate_obdo(tsi, &fm_key->lfik_oa);
01183                 if (rc)
01184                         RETURN(err_serious(rc));
01185 
01186                 fid = &fm_key->lfik_oa.o_oi.oi_fid;
01187 
01188                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "get FIEMAP of object "DFID"\n", PFID(fid));
01189 
01190                 replylen = fiemap_count_to_size(
01191                                         fm_key->lfik_fiemap.fm_extent_count);
01192                 req_capsule_set_size(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_FIEMAP_VAL,
01193                                      RCL_SERVER, replylen);
01194 
01195                 rc = req_capsule_server_pack(tsi->tsi_pill);
01196                 if (rc)
01197                         RETURN(err_serious(rc));
01198 
01199                 fiemap = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_FIEMAP_VAL);
01200                 if (fiemap == NULL)
01201                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01202 
01203                 *fiemap = fm_key->lfik_fiemap;
01204                 rc = ofd_fiemap_get(tsi->tsi_env, ofd, fid, fiemap);
01205 
01206                 /* LU-3219: Lock the sparse areas to make sure dirty
01207                  * flushed back from client, then call fiemap again. */
01208                 if (fm_key->lfik_oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS &&
01209                     fm_key->lfik_oa.o_flags & OBD_FL_SRVLOCK) {
01210                         struct list_head locked;
01211 
01212                         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&locked);
01213                         ost_fid_build_resid(fid, &fti->fti_resid);
01214                         rc = lock_zero_regions(ofd->ofd_namespace,
01215                                                &fti->fti_resid, fiemap,
01216                                                &locked);
01217                         if (rc == 0 && !list_empty(&locked)) {
01218                                 rc = ofd_fiemap_get(tsi->tsi_env, ofd, fid,
01219                                                     fiemap);
01220                                 unlock_zero_regions(ofd->ofd_namespace,
01221                                                     &locked);
01222                         }
01223                 }
01224         } else if (KEY_IS(KEY_LAST_FID)) {
01225                 struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_exp(exp);
01226                 struct ofd_seq          *oseq;
01227                 struct lu_fid           *fid;
01228                 int                      rc;
01229 
01230                 req_capsule_extend(tsi->tsi_pill, &RQF_OST_GET_INFO_LAST_FID);
01231                 rc = req_capsule_server_pack(tsi->tsi_pill);
01232                 if (rc)
01233                         RETURN(err_serious(rc));
01234 
01235                 fid = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_FID);
01236                 if (fid == NULL)
01237                         RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
01238 
01239                 fid_le_to_cpu(&fti->fti_ostid.oi_fid, fid);
01240 
01241                 fid = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_FID);
01242                 if (fid == NULL)
01243                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01244 
01245                 oseq = ofd_seq_load(tsi->tsi_env, ofd,
01246                                     ostid_seq(&fti->fti_ostid));
01247                 if (IS_ERR(oseq))
01248                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(oseq));
01249 
01250                 rc = ostid_to_fid(fid, &oseq->os_oi,
01251                                   ofd->ofd_lut.lut_lsd.lsd_osd_index);
01252                 if (rc != 0)
01253                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
01254 
01255                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: LAST FID is "DFID"\n", ofd_name(ofd),
01256                        PFID(fid));
01257 out_put:
01258                 ofd_seq_put(tsi->tsi_env, oseq);
01259         } else {
01260                 CERROR("%s: not supported key %s\n", tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt),
01261                        (char *)key);
01262                 rc = -EOPNOTSUPP;
01263         }
01264         ofd_counter_incr(tsi->tsi_exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_GET_INFO,
01265                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
01266 
01267         RETURN(rc);
01268 }
01269 
01281 static int ofd_getattr_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01282 {
01283         struct ofd_thread_info  *fti = tsi2ofd_info(tsi);
01284         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_exp(tsi->tsi_exp);
01285         struct ost_body         *repbody;
01286         struct lustre_handle     lh = { 0 };
01287         struct ofd_object       *fo;
01288         __u64                    flags = 0;
01289         enum ldlm_mode           lock_mode = LCK_PR;
01290         bool                     srvlock;
01291         int                      rc;
01292         ENTRY;
01293 
01294         LASSERT(tsi->tsi_ost_body != NULL);
01295 
01296         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
01297         if (repbody == NULL)
01298                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01299 
01300         repbody->oa.o_oi = tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa.o_oi;
01301         repbody->oa.o_valid = OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_FLGROUP;
01302 
01303         srvlock = tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS &&
01304                   tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa.o_flags & OBD_FL_SRVLOCK;
01305 
01306         if (srvlock) {
01307                 if (unlikely(tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa.o_flags & OBD_FL_FLUSH))
01308                         lock_mode = LCK_PW;
01309 
01310                 rc = tgt_extent_lock(tsi->tsi_tgt->lut_obd->obd_namespace,
01311                                      &tsi->tsi_resid, 0, OBD_OBJECT_EOF, &lh,
01312                                      lock_mode, &flags);
01313                 if (rc != 0)
01314                         RETURN(rc);
01315         }
01316 
01317         fo = ofd_object_find_exists(tsi->tsi_env, ofd, &tsi->tsi_fid);
01318         if (IS_ERR(fo))
01319                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(fo));
01320 
01321         rc = ofd_attr_get(tsi->tsi_env, fo, &fti->fti_attr);
01322         if (rc == 0) {
01323                 __u64    curr_version;
01324 
01325                 obdo_from_la(&repbody->oa, &fti->fti_attr,
01326                              OFD_VALID_FLAGS | LA_UID | LA_GID);
01327                 tgt_drop_id(tsi->tsi_exp, &repbody->oa);
01328 
01329                 /* Store object version in reply */
01330                 curr_version = dt_version_get(tsi->tsi_env,
01331                                               ofd_object_child(fo));
01332                 if ((__s64)curr_version != -EOPNOTSUPP) {
01333                         repbody->oa.o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLDATAVERSION;
01334                         repbody->oa.o_data_version = curr_version;
01335                 }
01336         }
01337 
01338         ofd_object_put(tsi->tsi_env, fo);
01339 out:
01340         if (srvlock)
01341                 tgt_extent_unlock(&lh, lock_mode);
01342 
01343         ofd_counter_incr(tsi->tsi_exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_GETATTR,
01344                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
01345 
01346         repbody->oa.o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
01347         repbody->oa.o_flags = OBD_FL_FLUSH;
01348 
01349         RETURN(rc);
01350 }
01351 
01363 static int ofd_setattr_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01364 {
01365         struct ofd_thread_info  *fti = tsi2ofd_info(tsi);
01366         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_exp(tsi->tsi_exp);
01367         struct ost_body         *body = tsi->tsi_ost_body;
01368         struct ost_body         *repbody;
01369         struct ldlm_resource    *res;
01370         struct ofd_object       *fo;
01371         struct filter_fid       *ff = NULL;
01372         int                      rc = 0;
01373 
01374         ENTRY;
01375 
01376         LASSERT(body != NULL);
01377 
01378         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
01379         if (repbody == NULL)
01380                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01381 
01382         repbody->oa.o_oi = body->oa.o_oi;
01383         repbody->oa.o_valid = OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_FLGROUP;
01384 
01385         /* This would be very bad - accidentally truncating a file when
01386          * changing the time or similar - bug 12203. */
01387         if (body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLSIZE &&
01388             body->oa.o_size != OBD_OBJECT_EOF) {
01389                 static char mdsinum[48];
01390 
01391                 if (body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFID)
01392                         snprintf(mdsinum, sizeof(mdsinum) - 1,
01393                                  "of parent "DFID, body->oa.o_parent_seq,
01394                                  body->oa.o_parent_oid, 0);
01395                 else
01396                         mdsinum[0] = '\0';
01397 
01398                 CERROR("%s: setattr from %s is trying to truncate object "DFID
01399                        " %s\n", ofd_name(ofd), obd_export_nid2str(tsi->tsi_exp),
01400                        PFID(&tsi->tsi_fid), mdsinum);
01401                 RETURN(-EPERM);
01402         }
01403 
01404         fo = ofd_object_find_exists(tsi->tsi_env, ofd, &tsi->tsi_fid);
01405         if (IS_ERR(fo))
01406                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(fo));
01407 
01408         la_from_obdo(&fti->fti_attr, &body->oa, body->oa.o_valid);
01409         fti->fti_attr.la_valid &= ~LA_TYPE;
01410 
01411         if (body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFID) {
01412                 ff = &fti->fti_mds_fid;
01413                 ofd_prepare_fidea(ff, &body->oa);
01414         }
01415 
01416         /* setting objects attributes (including owner/group) */
01417         rc = ofd_attr_set(tsi->tsi_env, fo, &fti->fti_attr, ff);
01418         if (rc != 0)
01419                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01420 
01421         obdo_from_la(&repbody->oa, &fti->fti_attr,
01422                      OFD_VALID_FLAGS | LA_UID | LA_GID);
01423         tgt_drop_id(tsi->tsi_exp, &repbody->oa);
01424 
01425         ofd_counter_incr(tsi->tsi_exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_SETATTR,
01426                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
01427         EXIT;
01428 out_put:
01429         ofd_object_put(tsi->tsi_env, fo);
01430 out:
01431         if (rc == 0) {
01432                 /* we do not call this before to avoid lu_object_find() in
01433                  *  ->lvbo_update() holding another reference on the object.
01434                  * otherwise concurrent destroy can make the object unavailable
01435                  * for 2nd lu_object_find() waiting for the first reference
01436                  * to go... deadlock! */
01437                 res = ldlm_resource_get(ofd->ofd_namespace, NULL,
01438                                         &tsi->tsi_resid, LDLM_EXTENT, 0);
01439                 if (!IS_ERR(res)) {
01440                         ldlm_res_lvbo_update(res, NULL, 0);
01441                         ldlm_resource_putref(res);
01442                 }
01443         }
01444         return rc;
01445 }
01446 
01461 static int ofd_orphans_destroy(const struct lu_env *env,
01462                                struct obd_export *exp,
01463                                struct ofd_device *ofd, struct obdo *oa)
01464 {
01465         struct ofd_thread_info  *info   = ofd_info(env);
01466         struct lu_fid           *fid    = &info->fti_fid;
01467         struct ost_id           *oi     = &oa->o_oi;
01468         struct ofd_seq          *oseq;
01469         u64                      seq    = ostid_seq(oi);
01470         u64                      end_id = ostid_id(oi);
01471         u64                      last;
01472         u64                      oid;
01473         int                      skip_orphan;
01474         int                      rc     = 0;
01475 
01476         ENTRY;
01477 
01478         oseq = ofd_seq_get(ofd, seq);
01479         if (oseq == NULL) {
01480                 CERROR("%s: Can not find seq for "DOSTID"\n",
01481                        ofd_name(ofd), POSTID(oi));
01482                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
01483         }
01484 
01485         *fid = oi->oi_fid;
01486         last = ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq);
01487         oid = last;
01488 
01489         LASSERT(exp != NULL);
01490         skip_orphan = !!(exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_SKIP_ORPHAN);
01491 
01492         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_NODESTROY))
01493                 goto done;
01494 
01495         LCONSOLE(D_INFO, "%s: deleting orphan objects from "DOSTID
01496                  " to "DOSTID"\n", ofd_name(ofd), seq, end_id + 1, seq, last);
01497 
01498         while (oid > end_id) {
01499                 rc = fid_set_id(fid, oid);
01500                 if (unlikely(rc != 0))
01501                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
01502 
01503                 rc = ofd_destroy_by_fid(env, ofd, fid, 1);
01504                 if (rc != 0 && rc != -ENOENT && rc != -ESTALE &&
01505                     likely(rc != -EREMCHG && rc != -EINPROGRESS))
01506                         /* this is pretty fatal... */
01507                         CEMERG("%s: error destroying precreated id "
01508                                DFID": rc = %d\n",
01509                                ofd_name(ofd), PFID(fid), rc);
01510 
01511                 oid--;
01512                 if (!skip_orphan) {
01513                         ofd_seq_last_oid_set(oseq, oid);
01514                         /* update last_id on disk periodically so that if we
01515                          * restart * we don't need to re-scan all of the just
01516                          * deleted objects. */
01517                         if ((oid & 511) == 0)
01518                                 ofd_seq_last_oid_write(env, ofd, oseq);
01519                 }
01520         }
01521 
01522         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: after destroy: set last_id to "DOSTID"\n",
01523                ofd_name(ofd), seq, oid);
01524 
01525 done:
01526         if (!skip_orphan) {
01527                 ofd_seq_last_oid_set(oseq, oid);
01528                 rc = ofd_seq_last_oid_write(env, ofd, oseq);
01529         } else {
01530                 /* don't reuse orphan object, return last used objid */
01531                 ostid_set_id(oi, last);
01532                 rc = 0;
01533         }
01534 
01535         GOTO(out_put, rc);
01536 
01537 out_put:
01538         ofd_seq_put(env, oseq);
01539         return rc;
01540 }
01541 
01553 static int ofd_create_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01554 {
01555         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
01556         struct ost_body         *repbody;
01557         const struct obdo       *oa = &tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa;
01558         struct obdo             *rep_oa;
01559         struct obd_export       *exp = tsi->tsi_exp;
01560         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_exp(exp);
01561         u64                      seq = ostid_seq(&oa->o_oi);
01562         u64                      oid = ostid_id(&oa->o_oi);
01563         struct ofd_seq          *oseq;
01564         int                      rc = 0, diff;
01565         int                      sync_trans = 0;
01566         long                     granted = 0;
01567 
01568         ENTRY;
01569 
01570         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_EROFS))
01571                 RETURN(-EROFS);
01572 
01573         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
01574         if (repbody == NULL)
01575                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01576 
01577         down_read(&ofd->ofd_lastid_rwsem);
01578         /* Currently, for safe, we do not distinguish which LAST_ID is broken,
01579          * we may do that in the future.
01580          * Return -ENOSPC until the LAST_ID rebuilt. */
01581         if (unlikely(ofd->ofd_lastid_rebuilding))
01582                 GOTO(out_sem, rc = -ENOSPC);
01583 
01584         rep_oa = &repbody->oa;
01585         rep_oa->o_oi = oa->o_oi;
01586 
01587         LASSERT(seq >= FID_SEQ_OST_MDT0);
01588         LASSERT(oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLGROUP);
01589 
01590         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "ofd_create("DOSTID")\n", POSTID(&oa->o_oi));
01591 
01592         oseq = ofd_seq_load(tsi->tsi_env, ofd, seq);
01593         if (IS_ERR(oseq)) {
01594                 CERROR("%s: Can't find FID Sequence "LPX64": rc = %ld\n",
01595                        ofd_name(ofd), seq, PTR_ERR(oseq));
01596                 GOTO(out_sem, rc = -EINVAL);
01597         }
01598 
01599         if ((oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS) &&
01600             (oa->o_flags & OBD_FL_RECREATE_OBJS)) {
01601                 if (!ofd_obd(ofd)->obd_recovering ||
01602                     oid > ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq)) {
01603                         CERROR("%s: recreate objid "DOSTID" > last id "LPU64
01604                                "\n", ofd_name(ofd), POSTID(&oa->o_oi),
01605                                ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq));
01606                         GOTO(out_nolock, rc = -EINVAL);
01607                 }
01608                 /* Do nothing here, we re-create objects during recovery
01609                  * upon write replay, see ofd_preprw_write() */
01610                 GOTO(out_nolock, rc = 0);
01611         }
01612         /* former ofd_handle_precreate */
01613         if ((oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS) &&
01614             (oa->o_flags & OBD_FL_DELORPHAN)) {
01615                 exp->exp_filter_data.fed_lastid_gen = ofd->ofd_lastid_gen;
01616 
01617                 /* destroy orphans */
01618                 if (lustre_msg_get_conn_cnt(tgt_ses_req(tsi)->rq_reqmsg) <
01619                     exp->exp_conn_cnt) {
01620                         CERROR("%s: dropping old orphan cleanup request\n",
01621                                ofd_name(ofd));
01622                         GOTO(out_nolock, rc = 0);
01623                 }
01624                 /* This causes inflight precreates to abort and drop lock */
01625                 oseq->os_destroys_in_progress = 1;
01626                 mutex_lock(&oseq->os_create_lock);
01627                 if (!oseq->os_destroys_in_progress) {
01628                         CERROR("%s:["LPU64"] destroys_in_progress already"
01629                                " cleared\n", ofd_name(ofd), seq);
01630                         ostid_set_id(&rep_oa->o_oi, ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq));
01631                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
01632                 }
01633                 diff = oid - ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq);
01634                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "ofd_last_id() = "LPU64" -> diff = %d\n",
01635                         ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq), diff);
01636                 if (-diff > OST_MAX_PRECREATE) {
01637                         /* Let MDS know that we are so far ahead. */
01638                         ostid_set_id(&rep_oa->o_oi, ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq) + 1);
01639                         rc = 0;
01640                 } else if (diff < 0) {
01641                         rc = ofd_orphans_destroy(tsi->tsi_env, exp,
01642                                                  ofd, rep_oa);
01643                         oseq->os_destroys_in_progress = 0;
01644                 } else {
01645                         /* XXX: Used by MDS for the first time! */
01646                         oseq->os_destroys_in_progress = 0;
01647                 }
01648         } else {
01649                 if (unlikely(exp->exp_filter_data.fed_lastid_gen !=
01650                              ofd->ofd_lastid_gen)) {
01651                         /* Keep the export ref so we can send the reply. */
01652                         ofd_obd_disconnect(class_export_get(exp));
01653                         GOTO(out_nolock, rc = -ENOTCONN);
01654                 }
01655 
01656                 mutex_lock(&oseq->os_create_lock);
01657                 if (lustre_msg_get_conn_cnt(tgt_ses_req(tsi)->rq_reqmsg) <
01658                     exp->exp_conn_cnt) {
01659                         CERROR("%s: dropping old precreate request\n",
01660                                ofd_name(ofd));
01661                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
01662                 }
01663                 /* only precreate if seq is 0, IDIF or normal and also o_id
01664                  * must be specfied */
01665                 if ((!fid_seq_is_mdt(seq) && !fid_seq_is_norm(seq) &&
01666                      !fid_seq_is_idif(seq)) || oid == 0) {
01667                         diff = 1; /* shouldn't we create this right now? */
01668                 } else {
01669                         diff = oid - ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq);
01670                         /* Do sync create if the seq is about to used up */
01671                         if (fid_seq_is_idif(seq) || fid_seq_is_mdt0(seq)) {
01672                                 if (unlikely(oid >= IDIF_MAX_OID - 1))
01673                                         sync_trans = 1;
01674                         } else if (fid_seq_is_norm(seq)) {
01675                                 if (unlikely(oid >=
01676                                              LUSTRE_DATA_SEQ_MAX_WIDTH - 1))
01677                                         sync_trans = 1;
01678                         } else {
01679                                 CERROR("%s : invalid o_seq "DOSTID"\n",
01680                                        ofd_name(ofd), POSTID(&oa->o_oi));
01681                                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01682                         }
01683 
01684                         if (diff < 0) {
01685                                 /* LU-5648 */
01686                                 CERROR("%s: invalid precreate request for "
01687                                        DOSTID", last_id " LPU64 ". "
01688                                        "Likely MDS last_id corruption\n",
01689                                        ofd_name(ofd), POSTID(&oa->o_oi),
01690                                        ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq));
01691                                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01692                         }
01693                 }
01694         }
01695         if (diff > 0) {
01696                 cfs_time_t       enough_time = cfs_time_shift(DISK_TIMEOUT);
01697                 u64              next_id;
01698                 int              created = 0;
01699                 int              count;
01700 
01701                 if (!(oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS) ||
01702                     !(oa->o_flags & OBD_FL_DELORPHAN)) {
01703                         /* don't enforce grant during orphan recovery */
01704                         granted = ofd_grant_create(tsi->tsi_env,
01705                                                   ofd_obd(ofd)->obd_self_export,
01706                                                    &diff);
01707                         if (granted < 0) {
01708                                 rc = granted;
01709                                 granted = 0;
01710                                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: failed to acquire grant "
01711                                        "space for precreate (%d): rc = %d\n",
01712                                        ofd_name(ofd), diff, rc);
01713                                 diff = 0;
01714                         }
01715                 }
01716 
01717                 /* This can happen if a new OST is formatted and installed
01718                  * in place of an old one at the same index.  Instead of
01719                  * precreating potentially millions of deleted old objects
01720                  * (possibly filling the OST), only precreate the last batch.
01721                  * LFSCK will eventually clean up any orphans. LU-14 */
01722                 if (diff > 5 * OST_MAX_PRECREATE) {
01723                         diff = OST_MAX_PRECREATE / 2;
01724                         LCONSOLE_WARN("%s: Too many FIDs to precreate "
01725                                       "OST replaced or reformatted: "
01726                                       "LFSCK will clean up",
01727                                       ofd_name(ofd));
01728 
01729                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: precreate FID "DOSTID" is over "
01730                                "%u larger than the LAST_ID "DOSTID", only "
01731                                "precreating the last %u objects.\n",
01732                                ofd_name(ofd), POSTID(&oa->o_oi),
01733                                5 * OST_MAX_PRECREATE,
01734                                POSTID(&oseq->os_oi), diff);
01735                         ofd_seq_last_oid_set(oseq, ostid_id(&oa->o_oi) - diff);
01736                 }
01737 
01738                 while (diff > 0) {
01739                         next_id = ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq) + 1;
01740                         count = ofd_precreate_batch(ofd, diff);
01741 
01742                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: reserve %d objects in group "LPX64
01743                                " at "LPU64"\n", ofd_name(ofd),
01744                                count, seq, next_id);
01745 
01746                         if (!(lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_REPLAY)
01747                             && cfs_time_after(jiffies, enough_time)) {
01748                                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: Slow creates, %d/%d objects"
01749                                       " created at a rate of %d/s\n",
01750                                       ofd_name(ofd), created, diff + created,
01751                                       created / DISK_TIMEOUT);
01752                                 break;
01753                         }
01754 
01755                         rc = ofd_precreate_objects(tsi->tsi_env, ofd, next_id,
01756                                                    oseq, count, sync_trans);
01757                         if (rc > 0) {
01758                                 created += rc;
01759                                 diff -= rc;
01760                         } else if (rc < 0) {
01761                                 break;
01762                         }
01763                 }
01764 
01765                 if (diff > 0 &&
01766                     lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_REPLAY)
01767                         LCONSOLE_WARN("%s: can't create the same count of"
01768                                       " objects when replaying the request"
01769                                       " (diff is %d). see LU-4621\n",
01770                                       ofd_name(ofd), diff);
01771 
01772                 if (created > 0)
01773                         /* some objects got created, we can return
01774                          * them, even if last creation failed */
01775                         rc = 0;
01776                 else
01777                         CERROR("%s: unable to precreate: rc = %d\n",
01778                                ofd_name(ofd), rc);
01779 
01780                 if (!(oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS) ||
01781                     !(oa->o_flags & OBD_FL_DELORPHAN)) {
01782                         ofd_grant_commit(ofd_obd(ofd)->obd_self_export, granted,
01783                                          rc);
01784                         granted = 0;
01785                 }
01786 
01787                 ostid_set_id(&rep_oa->o_oi, ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq));
01788         }
01789         EXIT;
01790         ofd_counter_incr(exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_CREATE,
01791                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
01792 out:
01793         mutex_unlock(&oseq->os_create_lock);
01794 out_nolock:
01795         if (rc == 0) {
01796 #if LUSTRE_VERSION_CODE < OBD_OCD_VERSION(2, 8, 53, 0)
01797                 struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(tsi->tsi_env);
01798                 struct lu_fid           *fid = &info->fti_fid;
01799 
01800                 /* For compatible purpose, it needs to convert back to
01801                  * OST ID before put it on wire. */
01802                 *fid = rep_oa->o_oi.oi_fid;
01803                 fid_to_ostid(fid, &rep_oa->o_oi);
01804 #endif
01805                 rep_oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_FLGROUP;
01806         }
01807         ofd_seq_put(tsi->tsi_env, oseq);
01808 
01809 out_sem:
01810         up_read(&ofd->ofd_lastid_rwsem);
01811         return rc;
01812 }
01813 
01825 static int ofd_destroy_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01826 {
01827         const struct ost_body   *body = tsi->tsi_ost_body;
01828         struct ost_body         *repbody;
01829         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_exp(tsi->tsi_exp);
01830         struct ofd_thread_info  *fti = tsi2ofd_info(tsi);
01831         struct lu_fid           *fid = &fti->fti_fid;
01832         u64                      oid;
01833         u32                      count;
01834         int                      rc = 0;
01835 
01836         ENTRY;
01837 
01838         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_EROFS))
01839                 RETURN(-EROFS);
01840 
01841         /* This is old case for clients before Lustre 2.4 */
01842         /* If there's a DLM request, cancel the locks mentioned in it */
01843         if (req_capsule_field_present(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_DLM_REQ,
01844                                       RCL_CLIENT)) {
01845                 struct ldlm_request *dlm;
01846 
01847                 dlm = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_DLM_REQ);
01848                 if (dlm == NULL)
01849                         RETURN(-EFAULT);
01850                 ldlm_request_cancel(tgt_ses_req(tsi), dlm, 0, LATF_SKIP);
01851         }
01852 
01853         *fid = body->oa.o_oi.oi_fid;
01854         oid = ostid_id(&body->oa.o_oi);
01855         LASSERT(oid != 0);
01856 
01857         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
01858 
01859         /* check that o_misc makes sense */
01860         if (body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLOBJCOUNT)
01861                 count = body->oa.o_misc;
01862         else
01863                 count = 1; /* default case - single destroy */
01864 
01865         CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: Destroy object "DOSTID" count %d\n", ofd_name(ofd),
01866                POSTID(&body->oa.o_oi), count);
01867 
01868         while (count > 0) {
01869                 int lrc;
01870 
01871                 lrc = ofd_destroy_by_fid(tsi->tsi_env, ofd, fid, 0);
01872                 if (lrc == -ENOENT) {
01873                         CDEBUG(D_INODE,
01874                                "%s: destroying non-existent object "DFID"\n",
01875                                ofd_name(ofd), PFID(fid));
01876                         /* rewrite rc with -ENOENT only if it is 0 */
01877                         if (rc == 0)
01878                                 rc = lrc;
01879                 } else if (lrc != 0) {
01880                         CERROR("%s: error destroying object "DFID": %d\n",
01881                                ofd_name(ofd), PFID(fid), lrc);
01882                         rc = lrc;
01883                 }
01884 
01885                 count--;
01886                 oid++;
01887                 lrc = fid_set_id(fid, oid);
01888                 if (unlikely(lrc != 0 && count > 0))
01889                         GOTO(out, rc = lrc);
01890         }
01891 
01892         ofd_counter_incr(tsi->tsi_exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_DESTROY,
01893                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
01894 
01895         GOTO(out, rc);
01896 
01897 out:
01898         fid_to_ostid(fid, &repbody->oa.o_oi);
01899         return rc;
01900 }
01901 
01913 static int ofd_statfs_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01914 {
01915         struct obd_statfs       *osfs;
01916         int                      rc;
01917 
01918         ENTRY;
01919 
01920         osfs = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OBD_STATFS);
01921 
01922         rc = ofd_statfs(tsi->tsi_env, tsi->tsi_exp, osfs,
01923                         cfs_time_shift_64(-OBD_STATFS_CACHE_SECONDS), 0);
01924         if (rc != 0)
01925                 CERROR("%s: statfs failed: rc = %d\n",
01926                        tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), rc);
01927 
01928         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_STATFS_EINPROGRESS))
01929                 rc = -EINPROGRESS;
01930 
01931         ofd_counter_incr(tsi->tsi_exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_STATFS,
01932                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
01933 
01934         RETURN(rc);
01935 }
01936 
01948 static int ofd_sync_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01949 {
01950         struct ost_body         *body = tsi->tsi_ost_body;
01951         struct ost_body         *repbody;
01952         struct ofd_thread_info  *fti = tsi2ofd_info(tsi);
01953         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_exp(tsi->tsi_exp);
01954         struct ofd_object       *fo = NULL;
01955         int                      rc = 0;
01956 
01957         ENTRY;
01958 
01959         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
01960 
01961         /* if no objid is specified, it means "sync whole filesystem" */
01962         if (!fid_is_zero(&tsi->tsi_fid)) {
01963                 fo = ofd_object_find_exists(tsi->tsi_env, ofd, &tsi->tsi_fid);
01964                 if (IS_ERR(fo))
01965                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(fo));
01966         }
01967 
01968         rc = tgt_sync(tsi->tsi_env, tsi->tsi_tgt,
01969                       fo != NULL ? ofd_object_child(fo) : NULL,
01970                       repbody->oa.o_size, repbody->oa.o_blocks);
01971         if (rc)
01972                 GOTO(put, rc);
01973 
01974         ofd_counter_incr(tsi->tsi_exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_SYNC,
01975                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
01976         if (fo == NULL)
01977                 RETURN(0);
01978 
01979         repbody->oa.o_oi = body->oa.o_oi;
01980         repbody->oa.o_valid = OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_FLGROUP;
01981 
01982         rc = ofd_attr_get(tsi->tsi_env, fo, &fti->fti_attr);
01983         if (rc == 0)
01984                 obdo_from_la(&repbody->oa, &fti->fti_attr,
01985                              OFD_VALID_FLAGS);
01986         else
01987                 /* don't return rc from getattr */
01988                 rc = 0;
01989         EXIT;
01990 put:
01991         if (fo != NULL)
01992                 ofd_object_put(tsi->tsi_env, fo);
01993         return rc;
01994 }
01995 
02007 static int ofd_punch_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02008 {
02009         const struct obdo       *oa = &tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa;
02010         struct ost_body         *repbody;
02011         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = tsi2ofd_info(tsi);
02012         struct ldlm_namespace   *ns = tsi->tsi_tgt->lut_obd->obd_namespace;
02013         struct ldlm_resource    *res;
02014         struct ofd_object       *fo;
02015         struct filter_fid       *ff = NULL;
02016         __u64                    flags = 0;
02017         struct lustre_handle     lh = { 0, };
02018         int                      rc;
02019         __u64                    start, end;
02020         bool                     srvlock;
02021 
02022         ENTRY;
02023 
02024         /* check that we do support OBD_CONNECT_TRUNCLOCK. */
02025         CLASSERT(OST_CONNECT_SUPPORTED & OBD_CONNECT_TRUNCLOCK);
02026 
02027         if ((oa->o_valid & (OBD_MD_FLSIZE | OBD_MD_FLBLOCKS)) !=
02028             (OBD_MD_FLSIZE | OBD_MD_FLBLOCKS))
02029                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02030 
02031         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
02032         if (repbody == NULL)
02033                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
02034 
02035         /* punch start,end are passed in o_size,o_blocks throught wire */
02036         start = oa->o_size;
02037         end = oa->o_blocks;
02038 
02039         if (end != OBD_OBJECT_EOF) /* Only truncate is supported */
02040                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
02041 
02042         /* standard truncate optimization: if file body is completely
02043          * destroyed, don't send data back to the server. */
02044         if (start == 0)
02045                 flags |= LDLM_FL_AST_DISCARD_DATA;
02046 
02047         repbody->oa.o_oi = oa->o_oi;
02048         repbody->oa.o_valid = OBD_MD_FLID;
02049 
02050         srvlock = oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS &&
02051                   oa->o_flags & OBD_FL_SRVLOCK;
02052 
02053         if (srvlock) {
02054                 rc = tgt_extent_lock(ns, &tsi->tsi_resid, start, end, &lh,
02055                                      LCK_PW, &flags);
02056                 if (rc != 0)
02057                         RETURN(rc);
02058         }
02059 
02060         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "calling punch for object "DFID", valid = "LPX64
02061                ", start = "LPD64", end = "LPD64"\n", PFID(&tsi->tsi_fid),
02062                oa->o_valid, start, end);
02063 
02064         fo = ofd_object_find_exists(tsi->tsi_env, ofd_exp(tsi->tsi_exp),
02065                                     &tsi->tsi_fid);
02066         if (IS_ERR(fo))
02067                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(fo));
02068 
02069         la_from_obdo(&info->fti_attr, oa,
02070                      OBD_MD_FLMTIME | OBD_MD_FLATIME | OBD_MD_FLCTIME);
02071         info->fti_attr.la_size = start;
02072         info->fti_attr.la_valid |= LA_SIZE;
02073 
02074         if (oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFID) {
02075                 ff = &info->fti_mds_fid;
02076                 ofd_prepare_fidea(ff, oa);
02077         }
02078 
02079         rc = ofd_object_punch(tsi->tsi_env, fo, start, end, &info->fti_attr,
02080                               ff, (struct obdo *)oa);
02081         if (rc)
02082                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
02083 
02084         ofd_counter_incr(tsi->tsi_exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_PUNCH,
02085                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
02086         EXIT;
02087 out_put:
02088         ofd_object_put(tsi->tsi_env, fo);
02089 out:
02090         if (srvlock)
02091                 tgt_extent_unlock(&lh, LCK_PW);
02092         if (rc == 0) {
02093                 /* we do not call this before to avoid lu_object_find() in
02094                  *  ->lvbo_update() holding another reference on the object.
02095                  * otherwise concurrent destroy can make the object unavailable
02096                  * for 2nd lu_object_find() waiting for the first reference
02097                  * to go... deadlock! */
02098                 res = ldlm_resource_get(ns, NULL, &tsi->tsi_resid,
02099                                         LDLM_EXTENT, 0);
02100                 if (!IS_ERR(res)) {
02101                         ldlm_res_lvbo_update(res, NULL, 0);
02102                         ldlm_resource_putref(res);
02103                 }
02104         }
02105         return rc;
02106 }
02107 
02118 static int ofd_ladvise_hdl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02119 {
02120         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
02121         struct obd_export       *exp = tsi->tsi_exp;
02122         struct ofd_device       *ofd = ofd_exp(exp);
02123         struct ost_body         *body, *repbody;
02124         struct ofd_thread_info  *info;
02125         struct ofd_object       *fo;
02126         const struct lu_env     *env = req->rq_svc_thread->t_env;
02127         int                      rc = 0;
02128         struct lu_ladvise       *ladvise;
02129         int                      num_advise;
02130         struct ladvise_hdr      *ladvise_hdr;
02131         int                      i;
02132         ENTRY;
02133 
02134         body = tsi->tsi_ost_body;
02135 
02136         if ((body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLID) != OBD_MD_FLID)
02137                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02138 
02139         ladvise_hdr = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill,
02140                                              &RMF_OST_LADVISE_HDR);
02141         if (ladvise_hdr == NULL)
02142                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02143 
02144         if (ladvise_hdr->lah_magic != LADVISE_MAGIC ||
02145             ladvise_hdr->lah_count < 1)
02146                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02147 
02148         if ((ladvise_hdr->lah_flags & (~LF_MASK)) != 0)
02149                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02150 
02151         ladvise = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OST_LADVISE);
02152         if (ladvise == NULL)
02153                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02154 
02155         num_advise = req_capsule_get_size(&req->rq_pill,
02156                                           &RMF_OST_LADVISE, RCL_CLIENT) /
02157                      sizeof(*ladvise);
02158         if (num_advise < ladvise_hdr->lah_count)
02159                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02160 
02161         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
02162         repbody->oa = body->oa;
02163 
02164         info = ofd_info_init(env, exp);
02165 
02166         rc = ostid_to_fid(&info->fti_fid, &body->oa.o_oi,
02167                           ofd->ofd_lut.lut_lsd.lsd_osd_index);
02168         if (rc != 0)
02169                 RETURN(rc);
02170 
02171         fo = ofd_object_find(env, ofd, &info->fti_fid);
02172         if (IS_ERR(fo)) {
02173                 rc = PTR_ERR(fo);
02174                 RETURN(rc);
02175         }
02176         LASSERT(fo != NULL);
02177 
02178         for (i = 0; i < num_advise; i++, ladvise++) {
02179                 if (ladvise->lla_end <= ladvise->lla_start) {
02180                         rc = err_serious(-EPROTO);
02181                         break;
02182                 }
02183 
02184                 /* Handle different advice types */
02185                 switch (ladvise->lla_advice) {
02186                 default:
02187                         rc = -ENOTSUPP;
02188                         break;
02189                 }
02190                 if (rc != 0)
02191                         break;
02192         }
02193 
02194         ofd_object_put(env, fo);
02195         req->rq_status = rc;
02196         RETURN(rc);
02197 }
02198 
02210 static int ofd_quotactl(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02211 {
02212         struct obd_quotactl     *oqctl, *repoqc;
02213         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap =
02214                 tsi->tsi_exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
02215         int                      id;
02216         int                      rc;
02217 
02218         ENTRY;
02219 
02220         oqctl = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OBD_QUOTACTL);
02221         if (oqctl == NULL)
02222                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02223 
02224         repoqc = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OBD_QUOTACTL);
02225         if (repoqc == NULL)
02226                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOMEM));
02227 
02228         *repoqc = *oqctl;
02229 
02230         id = repoqc->qc_id;
02231         if (oqctl->qc_type == USRQUOTA)
02232                 id = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_UID,
02233                                     NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS,
02234                                     repoqc->qc_id);
02235         else if (oqctl->qc_type == GRPQUOTA)
02236                 id = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_GID,
02237                                     NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS,
02238                                     repoqc->qc_id);
02239 
02240         if (repoqc->qc_id != id)
02241                 swap(repoqc->qc_id, id);
02242 
02243         rc = lquotactl_slv(tsi->tsi_env, tsi->tsi_tgt->lut_bottom, repoqc);
02244 
02245         ofd_counter_incr(tsi->tsi_exp, LPROC_OFD_STATS_QUOTACTL,
02246                          tsi->tsi_jobid, 1);
02247 
02248         if (repoqc->qc_id != id)
02249                 swap(repoqc->qc_id, id);
02250 
02251         RETURN(rc);
02252 }
02253 
02264 static inline int prolong_timeout(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
02265                                   struct ldlm_lock *lock)
02266 {
02267         struct ptlrpc_service_part *svcpt = req->rq_rqbd->rqbd_svcpt;
02268 
02269         if (AT_OFF)
02270                 return obd_timeout / 2;
02271 
02272         /* We are in the middle of the process - BL AST is sent, CANCEL
02273           is ahead. Take half of AT + IO process time. */
02274         return at_est2timeout(at_get(&svcpt->scp_at_estimate)) +
02275                 (ldlm_bl_timeout(lock) >> 1);
02276 }
02277 
02292 static int ofd_prolong_one_lock(struct tgt_session_info *tsi,
02293                                 struct ldlm_lock *lock,
02294                                 struct ldlm_extent *extent)
02295 {
02296         int timeout = prolong_timeout(tgt_ses_req(tsi), lock);
02297 
02298         if (lock->l_flags & LDLM_FL_DESTROYED) /* lock already cancelled */
02299                 return 0;
02300 
02301         /* XXX: never try to grab resource lock here because we're inside
02302          * exp_bl_list_lock; in ldlm_lockd.c to handle waiting list we take
02303          * res lock and then exp_bl_list_lock. */
02304 
02305         if (!(lock->l_flags & LDLM_FL_AST_SENT))
02306                 /* ignore locks not being cancelled */
02307                 return 0;
02308 
02309         LDLM_DEBUG(lock, "refreshed for req x"LPU64" ext("LPU64"->"LPU64") "
02310                          "to %ds.\n", tgt_ses_req(tsi)->rq_xid, extent->start,
02311                          extent->end, timeout);
02312 
02313         /* OK. this is a possible lock the user holds doing I/O
02314          * let's refresh eviction timer for it */
02315         ldlm_refresh_waiting_lock(lock, timeout);
02316         return 1;
02317 }
02318 
02344 static int ofd_prolong_extent_locks(struct tgt_session_info *tsi,
02345                                     __u64 start, __u64 end)
02346 {
02347         struct obd_export       *exp = tsi->tsi_exp;
02348         struct obdo             *oa  = &tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa;
02349         struct ldlm_extent       extent = {
02350                 .start = start,
02351                 .end = end
02352         };
02353         struct ldlm_lock        *lock;
02354         int                      lock_count = 0;
02355 
02356         ENTRY;
02357 
02358         if (oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLHANDLE) {
02359                 /* mostly a request should be covered by only one lock, try
02360                  * fast path. */
02361                 lock = ldlm_handle2lock(&oa->o_handle);
02362                 if (lock != NULL) {
02363                         /* Fast path to check if the lock covers the whole IO
02364                          * region exclusively. */
02365                         if (lock->l_granted_mode == LCK_PW &&
02366                             ldlm_extent_contain(&lock->l_policy_data.l_extent,
02367                                                 &extent)) {
02368                                 /* bingo */
02369                                 LASSERT(lock->l_export == exp);
02370                                 lock_count = ofd_prolong_one_lock(tsi, lock,
02371                                                                   &extent);
02372                                 LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
02373                                 RETURN(lock_count);
02374                         }
02375                         lock->l_last_used = cfs_time_current();
02376                         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
02377                 }
02378         }
02379 
02380         spin_lock_bh(&exp->exp_bl_list_lock);
02381         list_for_each_entry(lock, &exp->exp_bl_list, l_exp_list) {
02382                 LASSERT(lock->l_flags & LDLM_FL_AST_SENT);
02383                 LASSERT(lock->l_resource->lr_type == LDLM_EXTENT);
02384 
02385                 /* ignore waiting locks, no more granted locks in the list */
02386                 if (lock->l_granted_mode != lock->l_req_mode)
02387                         break;
02388 
02389                 if (!ldlm_res_eq(&tsi->tsi_resid, &lock->l_resource->lr_name))
02390                         continue;
02391 
02392                 if (!ldlm_extent_overlap(&lock->l_policy_data.l_extent,
02393                                          &extent))
02394                         continue;
02395 
02396                 lock_count += ofd_prolong_one_lock(tsi, lock, &extent);
02397         }
02398         spin_unlock_bh(&exp->exp_bl_list_lock);
02399 
02400         RETURN(lock_count);
02401 }
02402 
02422 static int ofd_rw_hpreq_lock_match(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
02423                                    struct ldlm_lock *lock)
02424 {
02425         struct niobuf_remote *rnb;
02426         struct obd_ioobj *ioo;
02427         enum ldlm_mode  mode;
02428         struct ldlm_extent ext;
02429         __u32 opc = lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg);
02430 
02431         ENTRY;
02432 
02433         ioo = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OBD_IOOBJ);
02434         LASSERT(ioo != NULL);
02435 
02436         rnb = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NIOBUF_REMOTE);
02437         LASSERT(rnb != NULL);
02438 
02439         ext.start = rnb->rnb_offset;
02440         rnb += ioo->ioo_bufcnt - 1;
02441         ext.end = rnb->rnb_offset + rnb->rnb_len - 1;
02442 
02443         LASSERT(lock->l_resource != NULL);
02444         if (!ostid_res_name_eq(&ioo->ioo_oid, &lock->l_resource->lr_name))
02445                 RETURN(0);
02446 
02447         /* a bulk write can only hold a reference on a PW extent lock */
02448         mode = LCK_PW;
02449         if (opc == OST_READ)
02450                 /* whereas a bulk read can be protected by either a PR or PW
02451                  * extent lock */
02452                 mode |= LCK_PR;
02453 
02454         if (!(lock->l_granted_mode & mode))
02455                 RETURN(0);
02456 
02457         RETURN(ldlm_extent_overlap(&lock->l_policy_data.l_extent, &ext));
02458 }
02459 
02471 static int ofd_rw_hpreq_check(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
02472 {
02473         struct tgt_session_info *tsi;
02474         struct obd_ioobj        *ioo;
02475         struct niobuf_remote    *rnb;
02476         __u64                    start, end;
02477         int                      lock_count;
02478 
02479         ENTRY;
02480 
02481         /* Don't use tgt_ses_info() to get session info, because lock_match()
02482          * can be called while request has no processing thread yet. */
02483         tsi = lu_context_key_get(&req->rq_session, &tgt_session_key);
02484 
02485         /*
02486          * Use LASSERT below because malformed RPCs should have
02487          * been filtered out in tgt_hpreq_handler().
02488          */
02489         ioo = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OBD_IOOBJ);
02490         LASSERT(ioo != NULL);
02491 
02492         rnb = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NIOBUF_REMOTE);
02493         LASSERT(rnb != NULL);
02494         LASSERT(!(rnb->rnb_flags & OBD_BRW_SRVLOCK));
02495 
02496         start = rnb->rnb_offset;
02497         rnb += ioo->ioo_bufcnt - 1;
02498         end = rnb->rnb_offset + rnb->rnb_len - 1;
02499 
02500         DEBUG_REQ(D_RPCTRACE, req, "%s %s: refresh rw locks: "DFID
02501                                    " ("LPU64"->"LPU64")\n",
02502                   tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), current->comm,
02503                   PFID(&tsi->tsi_fid), start, end);
02504 
02505         lock_count = ofd_prolong_extent_locks(tsi, start, end);
02506 
02507         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "%s: refreshed %u locks timeout for req %p.\n",
02508                tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), lock_count, req);
02509 
02510         RETURN(lock_count > 0);
02511 }
02512 
02521 static void ofd_rw_hpreq_fini(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
02522 {
02523         ofd_rw_hpreq_check(req);
02524 }
02525 
02540 static int ofd_punch_hpreq_lock_match(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
02541                                       struct ldlm_lock *lock)
02542 {
02543         struct tgt_session_info *tsi;
02544 
02545         /* Don't use tgt_ses_info() to get session info, because lock_match()
02546          * can be called while request has no processing thread yet. */
02547         tsi = lu_context_key_get(&req->rq_session, &tgt_session_key);
02548 
02549         /*
02550          * Use LASSERT below because malformed RPCs should have
02551          * been filtered out in tgt_hpreq_handler().
02552          */
02553         LASSERT(tsi->tsi_ost_body != NULL);
02554         if (tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLHANDLE &&
02555             tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa.o_handle.cookie == lock->l_handle.h_cookie)
02556                 return 1;
02557 
02558         return 0;
02559 }
02560 
02572 static int ofd_punch_hpreq_check(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
02573 {
02574         struct tgt_session_info *tsi;
02575         struct obdo             *oa;
02576         int                      lock_count;
02577 
02578         ENTRY;
02579 
02580         /* Don't use tgt_ses_info() to get session info, because lock_match()
02581          * can be called while request has no processing thread yet. */
02582         tsi = lu_context_key_get(&req->rq_session, &tgt_session_key);
02583         LASSERT(tsi != NULL);
02584         oa = &tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa;
02585 
02586         LASSERT(!(oa->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS &&
02587                   oa->o_flags & OBD_FL_SRVLOCK));
02588 
02589         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE,
02590                "%s: refresh locks: "LPU64"/"LPU64" ("LPU64"->"LPU64")\n",
02591                tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), tsi->tsi_resid.name[0],
02592                tsi->tsi_resid.name[1], oa->o_size, oa->o_blocks);
02593 
02594         lock_count = ofd_prolong_extent_locks(tsi, oa->o_size, oa->o_blocks);
02595 
02596         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "%s: refreshed %u locks timeout for req %p.\n",
02597                tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), lock_count, req);
02598 
02599         RETURN(lock_count > 0);
02600 }
02601 
02610 static void ofd_punch_hpreq_fini(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
02611 {
02612         ofd_punch_hpreq_check(req);
02613 }
02614 
02615 static struct ptlrpc_hpreq_ops ofd_hpreq_rw = {
02616         .hpreq_lock_match       = ofd_rw_hpreq_lock_match,
02617         .hpreq_check            = ofd_rw_hpreq_check,
02618         .hpreq_fini             = ofd_rw_hpreq_fini
02619 };
02620 
02621 static struct ptlrpc_hpreq_ops ofd_hpreq_punch = {
02622         .hpreq_lock_match       = ofd_punch_hpreq_lock_match,
02623         .hpreq_check            = ofd_punch_hpreq_check,
02624         .hpreq_fini             = ofd_punch_hpreq_fini
02625 };
02626 
02636 static void ofd_hp_brw(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02637 {
02638         struct niobuf_remote    *rnb;
02639         struct obd_ioobj        *ioo;
02640 
02641         ENTRY;
02642 
02643         ioo = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OBD_IOOBJ);
02644         LASSERT(ioo != NULL); /* must exist after request preprocessing */
02645         if (ioo->ioo_bufcnt > 0) {
02646                 rnb = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_NIOBUF_REMOTE);
02647                 LASSERT(rnb != NULL); /* must exist after request preprocessing */
02648 
02649                 /* no high priority if server lock is needed */
02650                 if (rnb->rnb_flags & OBD_BRW_SRVLOCK)
02651                         return;
02652         }
02653         tgt_ses_req(tsi)->rq_ops = &ofd_hpreq_rw;
02654 }
02655 
02665 static void ofd_hp_punch(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02666 {
02667         LASSERT(tsi->tsi_ost_body != NULL); /* must exists if we are here */
02668         /* no high-priority if server lock is needed */
02669         if (tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS &&
02670             tsi->tsi_ost_body->oa.o_flags & OBD_FL_SRVLOCK)
02671                 return;
02672         tgt_ses_req(tsi)->rq_ops = &ofd_hpreq_punch;
02673 }
02674 
02675 #define OBD_FAIL_OST_READ_NET   OBD_FAIL_OST_BRW_NET
02676 #define OBD_FAIL_OST_WRITE_NET  OBD_FAIL_OST_BRW_NET
02677 #define OST_BRW_READ    OST_READ
02678 #define OST_BRW_WRITE   OST_WRITE
02679 
02688 static struct tgt_handler ofd_tgt_handlers[] = {
02689 TGT_RPC_HANDLER(OST_FIRST_OPC,
02690                 0,                      OST_CONNECT,    tgt_connect,
02691                 &RQF_CONNECT, LUSTRE_OBD_VERSION),
02692 TGT_RPC_HANDLER(OST_FIRST_OPC,
02693                 0,                      OST_DISCONNECT, tgt_disconnect,
02694                 &RQF_OST_DISCONNECT, LUSTRE_OBD_VERSION),
02695 TGT_RPC_HANDLER(OST_FIRST_OPC,
02696                 0,                      OST_SET_INFO,   ofd_set_info_hdl,
02697                 &RQF_OBD_SET_INFO, LUSTRE_OST_VERSION),
02698 TGT_OST_HDL(0,                          OST_GET_INFO,   ofd_get_info_hdl),
02699 TGT_OST_HDL(HABEO_CORPUS| HABEO_REFERO, OST_GETATTR,    ofd_getattr_hdl),
02700 TGT_OST_HDL(HABEO_CORPUS| HABEO_REFERO | MUTABOR,
02701                                         OST_SETATTR,    ofd_setattr_hdl),
02702 TGT_OST_HDL(0           | HABEO_REFERO | MUTABOR,
02703                                         OST_CREATE,     ofd_create_hdl),
02704 TGT_OST_HDL(0           | HABEO_REFERO | MUTABOR,
02705                                         OST_DESTROY,    ofd_destroy_hdl),
02706 TGT_OST_HDL(0           | HABEO_REFERO, OST_STATFS,     ofd_statfs_hdl),
02707 TGT_OST_HDL_HP(HABEO_CORPUS| HABEO_REFERO,
02708                                         OST_BRW_READ,   tgt_brw_read,
02709                                                         ofd_hp_brw),
02710 /* don't set CORPUS flag for brw_write because -ENOENT may be valid case */
02711 TGT_OST_HDL_HP(HABEO_CORPUS| MUTABOR,   OST_BRW_WRITE,  tgt_brw_write,
02712                                                         ofd_hp_brw),
02713 TGT_OST_HDL_HP(HABEO_CORPUS| HABEO_REFERO | MUTABOR,
02714                                         OST_PUNCH,      ofd_punch_hdl,
02715                                                         ofd_hp_punch),
02716 TGT_OST_HDL(HABEO_CORPUS| HABEO_REFERO, OST_SYNC,       ofd_sync_hdl),
02717 TGT_OST_HDL(0           | HABEO_REFERO, OST_QUOTACTL,   ofd_quotactl),
02718 TGT_OST_HDL(HABEO_CORPUS | HABEO_REFERO, OST_LADVISE,   ofd_ladvise_hdl),
02719 };
02720 
02721 static struct tgt_opc_slice ofd_common_slice[] = {
02722         {
02723                 .tos_opc_start  = OST_FIRST_OPC,
02724                 .tos_opc_end    = OST_LAST_OPC,
02725                 .tos_hs         = ofd_tgt_handlers
02726         },
02727         {
02728                 .tos_opc_start  = OBD_FIRST_OPC,
02729                 .tos_opc_end    = OBD_LAST_OPC,
02730                 .tos_hs         = tgt_obd_handlers
02731         },
02732         {
02733                 .tos_opc_start  = LDLM_FIRST_OPC,
02734                 .tos_opc_end    = LDLM_LAST_OPC,
02735                 .tos_hs         = tgt_dlm_handlers
02736         },
02737         {
02738                 .tos_opc_start  = OUT_UPDATE_FIRST_OPC,
02739                 .tos_opc_end    = OUT_UPDATE_LAST_OPC,
02740                 .tos_hs         = tgt_out_handlers
02741         },
02742         {
02743                 .tos_opc_start  = SEQ_FIRST_OPC,
02744                 .tos_opc_end    = SEQ_LAST_OPC,
02745                 .tos_hs         = seq_handlers
02746         },
02747         {
02748                 .tos_opc_start  = LFSCK_FIRST_OPC,
02749                 .tos_opc_end    = LFSCK_LAST_OPC,
02750                 .tos_hs         = tgt_lfsck_handlers
02751         },
02752         {
02753                 .tos_opc_start  = SEC_FIRST_OPC,
02754                 .tos_opc_end    = SEC_LAST_OPC,
02755                 .tos_hs         = tgt_sec_ctx_handlers
02756         },
02757         {
02758                 .tos_hs         = NULL
02759         }
02760 };

02762 /* context key constructor/destructor: ofd_key_init(), ofd_key_fini() */
