02777 static void ofd_key_exit(const struct lu_context *ctx,
02778                          struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
02779 {
02780         struct ofd_thread_info *info = data;
02781 
02782         info->fti_env = NULL;
02783         info->fti_exp = NULL;
02784 
02785         info->fti_xid = 0;
02786         info->fti_pre_version = 0;
02787         info->fti_used = 0;
02788 
02789         memset(&info->fti_attr, 0, sizeof info->fti_attr);
02790 }
02791 
02792 struct lu_context_key ofd_thread_key = {
02793         .lct_tags = LCT_DT_THREAD,
02794         .lct_init = ofd_key_init,
02795         .lct_fini = ofd_key_fini,
02796         .lct_exit = ofd_key_exit
02797 };
02798 
02814 static int ofd_init0(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *m,
02815                      struct lu_device_type *ldt, struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
02816 {
02817         const char              *dev = lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 0);
02818         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = NULL;
02819         struct obd_device       *obd;
02820         struct obd_statfs       *osfs;
02821         int                      rc;
02822 
02823         ENTRY;
02824 
02825         obd = class_name2obd(dev);
02826         if (obd == NULL) {
02827                 CERROR("Cannot find obd with name %s\n", dev);
02828                 RETURN(-ENODEV);
02829         }
02830 
02831         rc = lu_env_refill((struct lu_env *)env);
02832         if (rc != 0)
02833                 RETURN(rc);
02834 
02835         obd->u.obt.obt_magic = OBT_MAGIC;
02836 
02837         m->ofd_fmd_max_num = OFD_FMD_MAX_NUM_DEFAULT;
02838         m->ofd_fmd_max_age = OFD_FMD_MAX_AGE_DEFAULT;
02839 
02840         spin_lock_init(&m->ofd_flags_lock);
02841         m->ofd_raid_degraded = 0;
02842         m->ofd_syncjournal = 0;
02843         ofd_slc_set(m);
02844         m->ofd_grant_compat_disable = 0;
02845         m->ofd_soft_sync_limit = OFD_SOFT_SYNC_LIMIT_DEFAULT;
02846         m->ofd_brw_size = ONE_MB_BRW_SIZE;
02847 
02848         /* statfs data */
02849         spin_lock_init(&m->ofd_osfs_lock);
02850         m->ofd_osfs_age = cfs_time_shift_64(-1000);
02851         m->ofd_osfs_unstable = 0;
02852         m->ofd_statfs_inflight = 0;
02853         m->ofd_osfs_inflight = 0;
02854 
02855         /* grant data */
02856         spin_lock_init(&m->ofd_grant_lock);
02857         m->ofd_tot_dirty = 0;
02858         m->ofd_tot_granted = 0;
02859         m->ofd_tot_pending = 0;
02860         m->ofd_seq_count = 0;
02861         init_waitqueue_head(&m->ofd_inconsistency_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
02862         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&m->ofd_inconsistency_list);
02863         spin_lock_init(&m->ofd_inconsistency_lock);
02864 
02865         spin_lock_init(&m->ofd_batch_lock);
02866         init_rwsem(&m->ofd_lastid_rwsem);
02867 
02868         m->ofd_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_ops = &ofd_lu_ops;
02869         m->ofd_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_obd = obd;
02870         /* set this lu_device to obd, because error handling need it */
02871         obd->obd_lu_dev = &m->ofd_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev;
02872 
02873         rc = ofd_procfs_init(m);
02874         if (rc) {
02875                 CERROR("Can't init ofd lprocfs, rc %d\n", rc);
02876                 RETURN(rc);
02877         }
02878 
02879         /* No connection accepted until configurations will finish */
02880         spin_lock(&obd->obd_dev_lock);
02881         obd->obd_no_conn = 1;
02882         spin_unlock(&obd->obd_dev_lock);
02883         obd->obd_replayable = 1;
02884         if (cfg->lcfg_bufcount > 4 && LUSTRE_CFG_BUFLEN(cfg, 4) > 0) {
02885                 char *str = lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 4);
02886 
02887                 if (strchr(str, 'n')) {
02888                         CWARN("%s: recovery disabled\n", obd->obd_name);
02889                         obd->obd_replayable = 0;
02890                 }
02891         }
02892 
02893         info = ofd_info_init(env, NULL);
02894         if (info == NULL)
02895                 GOTO(err_fini_proc, rc = -EFAULT);
02896 
02897         rc = ofd_stack_init(env, m, cfg);
02898         if (rc) {
02899                 CERROR("Can't init device stack, rc %d\n", rc);
02900                 GOTO(err_fini_proc, rc);
02901         }
02902 
02903         ofd_procfs_add_brw_stats_symlink(m);
02904 
02905         /* populate cached statfs data */
02906         osfs = &ofd_info(env)->fti_u.osfs;
02907         rc = ofd_statfs_internal(env, m, osfs, 0, NULL);
02908         if (rc != 0) {
02909                 CERROR("%s: can't get statfs data, rc %d\n", obd->obd_name, rc);
02910                 GOTO(err_fini_stack, rc);
02911         }
02912         if (!IS_PO2(osfs->os_bsize)) {
02913                 CERROR("%s: blocksize (%d) is not a power of 2\n",
02914                                 obd->obd_name, osfs->os_bsize);
02915                 GOTO(err_fini_stack, rc = -EPROTO);
02916         }
02917         m->ofd_blockbits = fls(osfs->os_bsize) - 1;
02918 
02919         m->ofd_precreate_batch = OFD_PRECREATE_BATCH_DEFAULT;
02920         if (osfs->os_bsize * osfs->os_blocks < OFD_PRECREATE_SMALL_FS)
02921                 m->ofd_precreate_batch = OFD_PRECREATE_BATCH_SMALL;
02922 
02923         snprintf(info->fti_u.name, sizeof(info->fti_u.name), "%s-%s",
02924                  "filter"/*LUSTRE_OST_NAME*/, obd->obd_uuid.uuid);
02925         m->ofd_namespace = ldlm_namespace_new(obd, info->fti_u.name,
02926                                               LDLM_NAMESPACE_SERVER,
02927                                               LDLM_NAMESPACE_GREEDY,
02928                                               LDLM_NS_TYPE_OST);
02929         if (m->ofd_namespace == NULL)
02930                 GOTO(err_fini_stack, rc = -ENOMEM);
02931         /* set obd_namespace for compatibility with old code */
02932         obd->obd_namespace = m->ofd_namespace;
02933         ldlm_register_intent(m->ofd_namespace, ofd_intent_policy);
02934         m->ofd_namespace->ns_lvbo = &ofd_lvbo;
02935         m->ofd_namespace->ns_lvbp = m;
02936 
02937         ptlrpc_init_client(LDLM_CB_REQUEST_PORTAL, LDLM_CB_REPLY_PORTAL,
02938                            "filter_ldlm_cb_client", &obd->obd_ldlm_client);
02939 
02940         dt_conf_get(env, m->ofd_osd, &m->ofd_dt_conf);
02941 
02942         rc = tgt_init(env, &m->ofd_lut, obd, m->ofd_osd, ofd_common_slice,
02943                       OBD_FAIL_OST_ALL_REQUEST_NET,
02944                       OBD_FAIL_OST_ALL_REPLY_NET);
02945         if (rc)
02946                 GOTO(err_free_ns, rc);
02947 
02948         rc = ofd_fs_setup(env, m, obd);
02949         if (rc)
02950                 GOTO(err_fini_lut, rc);
02951 
02952         rc = ofd_start_inconsistency_verification_thread(m);
02953         if (rc != 0)
02954                 GOTO(err_fini_fs, rc);
02955 
02956         tgt_adapt_sptlrpc_conf(&m->ofd_lut, 1);
02957 
02958         RETURN(0);
02959 
02960 err_fini_fs:
02961         ofd_fs_cleanup(env, m);
02962 err_fini_lut:
02963         tgt_fini(env, &m->ofd_lut);
02964 err_free_ns:
02965         ldlm_namespace_free(m->ofd_namespace, NULL, obd->obd_force);
02966         obd->obd_namespace = m->ofd_namespace = NULL;
02967 err_fini_stack:
02968         ofd_stack_fini(env, m, &m->ofd_osd->dd_lu_dev);
02969 err_fini_proc:
02970         ofd_procfs_fini(m);
02971         return rc;
02972 }
02973 
02983 static void ofd_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *m)
02984 {
02985         struct obd_device       *obd = ofd_obd(m);
02986         struct lu_device        *d   = &m->ofd_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev;
02987         struct lfsck_stop        stop;
02988 
02989         stop.ls_status = LS_PAUSED;
02990         stop.ls_flags = 0;
02991         lfsck_stop(env, m->ofd_osd, &stop);
02992         target_recovery_fini(obd);
02993         if (m->ofd_namespace != NULL)
02994                 ldlm_namespace_free_prior(m->ofd_namespace, NULL,
02995                                           d->ld_obd->obd_force);
02996 
02997         obd_exports_barrier(obd);
02998         obd_zombie_barrier();
02999 
03000         tgt_fini(env, &m->ofd_lut);
03001         ofd_stop_inconsistency_verification_thread(m);
03002         lfsck_degister(env, m->ofd_osd);
03003         ofd_fs_cleanup(env, m);
03004 
03005         if (m->ofd_namespace != NULL) {
03006                 ldlm_namespace_free_post(m->ofd_namespace);
03007                 d->ld_obd->obd_namespace = m->ofd_namespace = NULL;
03008         }
03009 
03010         ofd_stack_fini(env, m, &m->ofd_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev);
03011         ofd_procfs_fini(m);
03012         LASSERT(atomic_read(&d->ld_ref) == 0);
03013         server_put_mount(obd->obd_name, true);
03014         EXIT;
03015 }
03016 
03028 static struct lu_device *ofd_device_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
03029                                          struct lu_device *d)
03030 {
03031         ENTRY;
03032         ofd_fini(env, ofd_dev(d));
03033         RETURN(NULL);
03034 }
03035 
03046 static struct lu_device *ofd_device_free(const struct lu_env *env,
03047                                          struct lu_device *d)
03048 {
03049         struct ofd_device *m = ofd_dev(d);
03050 
03051         dt_device_fini(&m->ofd_dt_dev);
03052         OBD_FREE_PTR(m);
03053         RETURN(NULL);
03054 }
03055 
03069 static struct lu_device *ofd_device_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
03070                                           struct lu_device_type *t,
03071                                           struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
03072 {
03073         struct ofd_device *m;
03074         struct lu_device  *l;
03075         int                rc;
03076 
03077         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(m);
03078         if (m == NULL)
03079                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
03080 
03081         l = &m->ofd_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev;
03082         dt_device_init(&m->ofd_dt_dev, t);
03083         rc = ofd_init0(env, m, t, cfg);
03084         if (rc != 0) {
03085                 ofd_device_free(env, l);
03086                 l = ERR_PTR(rc);
03087         }
03088 
03089         return l;
03090 }

03104         .ldto_device_fini       = ofd_device_fini
03105 };

03109         .ldt_name       = LUSTRE_OST_NAME,
03110         .ldt_ops        = &ofd_device_type_ops,
03111         .ldt_ctx_tags   = LCT_DT_THREAD

03113 
03123 static int __init ofd_init(void)
03124 {
03125         int                             rc;
03126 
03127         rc = lu_kmem_init(ofd_caches);
03128         if (rc)
03129                 return rc;
03130 
03131         rc = ofd_fmd_init();
03132         if (rc) {
03133                 lu_kmem_fini(ofd_caches);
03134                 return(rc);
03135         }
03136 
03137         rc = class_register_type(&ofd_obd_ops, NULL, true, NULL,
03138                                  LUSTRE_OST_NAME, &ofd_device_type);
03139         return rc;
03140 }
03141 
03148 static void __exit ofd_exit(void)
03149 {
03150         ofd_fmd_exit();
03151         lu_kmem_fini(ofd_caches);
03152         class_unregister_type(LUSTRE_OST_NAME);
03153 }
